text:
Lucas Cornelis van Scheppingen (born 22 October 1976), better known under his stage name Laidback Luke, is a Dutch DJ and music producer from Hoofddorp, North Holland. He was born in Manila, Philippines. He is also a martial artist. He remixed the song "Show Me Love" by Robin S. which charted at #11 on the UK charts in 2009.
In 2012, Laidback Luke was nominated for the best European DJ award from the 27th Dance Music Awards. He appeared in the documentary movie "I'll Sleep When I'm Dead". The movie was nominated for Grammy Award.
